typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as float,
		{ Gross Sales } as float,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as float,
		{ COGS } as float,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeData
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as string,
		{ Gross Sales } as string,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as string,
		{ COGS } as string,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceData
EmployeeData split(equals(Country, 'Canada'),
	equals(Country, 'Germany'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CountryWiseFileSplit@(Canada, Germany)
CountryWiseFileSplit@Germany, SourceData exists(CountryWiseFileSplit@Germany@Country == SourceData@Country,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NoGermany'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
